mapper.select: SELECT TC_CODE AS USERID, TC_NAME AS USERNAME, TC_EMAIL AS EMAIL FROM TC WHERE TC_EMAIL=#{email}
select AC.ac_name as acName, tc.tc_code as tCode ,ac.ac_code as acCode from TA INNER JOIN TC ON ta.ta_tccode = TC.TC_CODE INNER JOIN AC ON ta.ta_accode = ac.ac_code where TC.TC_code = #{userId}

SELECT sb.sb_ACODE AS crCode, cl.cl_name AS clName , sb.sb_clcode as clCode FROM SB INNER JOIN CL ON SB.sb_clcode = CL.CL_CODE and sb.sb_clcrcode = cl.cl_crcode WHERE SB.sb_tccode=#{userId} AND cl.cl_craccode IN(SELECT AC_CODE FROM AC WHERE AC_NAME=#{acName})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TAH(TAH_TCACCODE, TAH_TCCODE, TAH_TIME, TAH_COCODE) VALUES((select ta.ta_accode from ta inner join ac on ta.ta_accode = ac.ac_code where ta.ta_password =#{password} and ta.ta_tccode =#{tCode} and ac.ac_name =#{acName}),#{tCode},DEFAULT,15)
mapper.select: SELECT st.st_name as sName, st.st_code as studentId , SB.SB_ACODE as crCode FROM BS INNER JOIN ST ON bs.bs_stcode = st.st_code INNER JOIN SB ON bs.bs_clcraccode = sb.sb_clcraccode WHERE sb.sb_tccode=#{teacherId} and sb.sb_clcode=#{clCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AT(AT_SBACODE, AT_STCODE, AT_DATE, AT_COCODE) VALUES(#{subjectCode}, #{studentId}, DEFAULT, #{atStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT co.co_code as atStatus, CO.CO_NAME AS atStatusName, ST.ST_NAME AS studentName, st.st_code as studentId, sb.sb_acode as subjectCode FROM AT INNER JOIN CO ON AT.AT_COCODE = CO.CO_CODE INNER JOIN SB ON AT.AT_SBACODE = SB.SB_ACODE INNER JOIN ST ON AT.AT_STCODE = ST.ST_CODE WHERE SUBSTR(AT.AT_DATE,1,8) = TO_DATE(#{weekDay}) AND SB.sb_tccode= #{teacherId} AND SB.sb_clcode = #{clCode}

SELECT CO.CO_NAME AS atStatusName, ST.ST_NAME AS studentName ,#{weekDay} as dayDate FROM AT INNER JOIN CO ON AT.AT_COCODE = CO.CO_CODE INNER JOIN SB ON AT.AT_SBACODE = SB_ACODE INNER JOIN ST ON AT.AT_STCODE = ST.ST_CODE WHERE SUBSTR(AT_DATE,1,8) =TO_DATE(#{weekDay}) AND sb.sb_tccode=#{teacherId}
SELECT count(at.at_date) as CT from at inner join SB on at.at_sbacode = sb.sb_acode WHERE sb.sb_tccode =#{userId} and SUBSTR(at.at_date,1,8) = TO_DATE(to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'))

SELECT st.st_code as studentId ,sb.sb_tccode as subjectCode FROM BS INNER JOIN ST ON bs.bs_stcode = st.st_code INNER JOIN SB ON bs.bs_clcraccode = sb.sb_clcraccode WHERE sb.sb_tccode=#{userId} and bs.bs_clcrcode IN(SELECT sb.sb_clcrcode FROM SB WHERE sb.sb_tccode=#{userId}) and bs.bs_clcode IN(SELECT sb.sb_clcode FROM SB WHERE sb.sb_tccode=#{userId})
mapper.insert: insert into at(at_sbacode,at_stcode,at_date,at_cocode) values((SELECT sb_acode FROM sb WHERE sb_tccode =#{subjectCode}), #{studentId},default,23)
mapper.select: SELECT st.st_name AS studentName, at.at_cocode AS atStatus , TO_CHAR(at.at_date,'HH24MI') AS dayDate FROM BS INNER JOIN ST ON bs.bs_stcode = st.st_code INNER JOIN SB ON bs.bs_clcraccode = sb.sb_clcraccode INNER JOIN AT ON bs.bs_stcode = at.at_stcode WHERE TO_CHAR(at.at_date,'YYYYMMDDHH24') IN(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')||(select SUBSTR(sb_stime,1,2) from SB where sb_tccode = #{userId})) and sb.sb_tccode= #{userId} and bs.bs_clcrcode IN(SELECT sb.sb_clcrcode FROM SB WHERE sb.sb_tccode=#{userId}) and bs.bs_clcode IN(SELECT sb.sb_clcode FROM SB WHERE sb.sb_tccode=#{userId})

SELECT AT.AT_COCODE AS atStatus, ST.ST_NAME AS studentName, AC.AC_NAME AS dayDate, sb.sb_asname AS subjectCode FROM AT INNER JOIN ST ON at.at_stcode = st.st_code INNER JOIN AC ON SUBSTR(at.at_sbacode,6,10) = ac.ac_code INNER JOIN CO ON at.at_cocode = co.co_code INNER JOIN SB ON at.at_sbacode = sb.sb_acode WHERE AT_STCODE IN(SELECT ST_CODE FROM ST WHERE ST_NAME = #{userId}) AND TO_CHAR(at.at_date,'YYYYMMDDHH24') IN(#{weekDay})||(select SUBSTR(sb_stime,1,2) from SB where sb_tccode = #{teacherId})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AT WHERE AT_STCODE IN(SELECT ST_CODE FROM ST WHERE ST_NAME = #{userId})
